summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. for the month of May 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, highlighting the financial activities of the account during this period.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of May 31, 2018, was $323,223.15.
The account had an interest payment of $192.05 for the month of May 2018.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the calendar year.
The annual percentage yield earned on the account was 0.70%.
The document is marked as confidential pursuant to Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
